author: Z-Shell Community
description: Automatic privacy is here. Download Firefox to block over 2000 trackers.
name: zsh-firefox-dev

plugin-info.message: A snippet providing Firefox Developer Edition.

default.atclone: local -A map; map=( '(#i)linux*' tar.bz2 '(#i)(cygwin|win|wsl)*' exe '(#i)darwin*' dmg ); local ext="${map[(k)$OSTYPE]}"; ziextract ff.pkg $ext --norm ${${OSTYPE:#(#i)(darwin|cygwin|win|wsl)*}:+--move}; command mv ff.pkg %ID%;

bgn.atclone: local -A map; map=( '(#i)linux*' tar.bz2 '(#i)(cygwin|win|wsl)*' exe '(#i)darwin*' dmg ); local ext="${map[(k)$OSTYPE]}"; ziextract ff.pkg $ext --norm ${${OSTYPE:#(#i)(darwin|cygwin|win|wsl)*}:+--move}; command mv ff.pkg %ID%;
